document_data.name: Halaband's Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Halaband's Inn''' was a small inn and tavern found in the town of [[Immersea]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Description: The inn was a dark and drafty establishment decorated with fine wood paneling.
document_data.Activities: Halaband's Inn was known to have a wider menu selection compared to the local competition. Bells were used to announce the arrival of food as well as to scare off the occasional [[bat]] that clung to the dumbwaiter used to deliver food.
document_data.History: Halaband's Inn was originally built by an adventurer to use as a base of operations.
